#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
unsigned long power(int n)
{

    unsigned long p=1;
    while(n--)
    {
        p*=2;
    }
return p;
}
int maxpower(int n)
{
  int i=0;
  while(pow(2,i)<=n)
  {
      ++i;
  }
  return i;
}
main()
{
//cout<<power(8);

int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    //unsigned long a[31]={1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,16384,32768,65536,131072,262144,524288,1048576,2097152,4194304,8388608,16777216,33554432,67108864,134217728,268435456,536870912};
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int x=maxpower(n);
    cout<<power(x-1)<<endl;
}

//cout<<power(3)<<endl;
//cout<<maxpower(10);

return 0;
}
